name: Project Mustard
description:
Project Mustard is about trying to create a fun / fresh 3d Sonic experience. Built from scratch, so there will be differences in terms of controls if you are used to games made in existing engines, as well as some buggy-ness probably. But all of the basics from Sonic are here. Currently the project is very very early in development and is more of a showcase of simple ideas.

This game was created for SAGE 2022.

Follow the trailer to find the OST on the same YouTube Channel.
